message.body: Ohh congratulations!!!! :D :D :D you're going to get a job offer there, promise. Also, want me to post on the Postbac listserv to see if anyone has openings in their lab?
Yes! Should we wait til all my recs are in though?
Up to you, I really don't know what most people do for that
Ill tell you when they're in and then you can post
No prob, and congrats again for being so on top of your shit
